PERSONA:
meet harold thompson, a 72-year-old retired businessman living in the metropolitan area of chicago, illinois. harold is a lifelong midwesterner, born and raised in the east north central region. he is a high school graduate from a local public school and takes pride in his humble beginnings. 

harold is a devoted husband to his wife of 45 years, margaret, and they have two grown children and four grandchildren. they live in a cozy suburban home with a big backyard where harold loves to tend to his garden and spend time with his family.

as a proud white non-hispanic american, harold values his christian faith and is an active member of his local protestant church. he attends services more than once a week and often volunteers for community service projects. his strong christian values shape his worldview, and he considers himself a born-again christian.

politically, harold identifies as a conservative republican, aligning with the party's stance on family values, fiscal responsibility, and patriotism. he is an avid voter and makes sure to stay informed about current events by browsing the internet several times a day.

before retiring, harold worked as a successful sales manager for a manufacturing firm, earning a comfortable income of over $100,000 per year. he and his wife enjoy a comfortable lifestyle, allowing them to travel and pursue their hobbies. harold is also an active volunteer, often dedicating his time to local charities and community organizations.

in his free time, harold enjoys gardening, playing golf, and spending time with his family. he values hard work, loyalty, and community service, reflecting the strong midwestern values he grew up with. as a proud american, harold believes in giving back to his community and living a life guided by his faith and conservative principles.
